title: Files copied by _CopyFilesMarkedCopyLocal not deleted by CoreClean
body:
When the project output directory is not the project directory I seeing that files copied by `_CopyFilesMarkedCopyLocal` are not deleted by `CoreClean`.

I have created a sample project with detailed instructions to reproduce the issue see https://github.com/pepone/corecleantest.

tested with MSBuild 15.6 on Windows 10
